TopicTitle: Looking for a few mods, haven't found them yet

Articles.Content:
I've been looking for two mods and apparently my Google skills aren't very good so I'm looking for some help. The two mods I'm looking for are:

-a mod that retextures planets and moons to a much higher quality texture, both at long distances and at the surface

-a mod that displays lots of useful information while not in map view (eg a window that shows time to apoapsis, time to fuel empty, current periapsis height, etc)

Thanks to anyone who can help!

1. You want either Texture Replacer (newer, seems faster, can use UR texture packs) or Universe Replacer. Texture packs here (if not in the TexRep thread): http://www.reddit.com/r/KSPTexturePacks/

2. VOID, MechJeb, or Kerbal Engineer Redux.
